Question: What are the names of the users who mentioned me in their tweets that also tagged the hashtag #blockchain?
Cypher:
MATCH (me:Me)<-[mentioned:MENTIONS]-(tweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag), (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet)
WHERE hashtag.name = "#blockchain"
RETURN user, posts, me, mentioned, tweet, tags, hashtag, user.name
Rewrite: Who are the users that mentioned me in their tweets which also included the hashtag #blockchain?

Question: List the screen names of Me-followers who posted tweets that mentioned the user 'johndoe'.
Cypher:
MATCH (meFollower:Me)-[:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)-[:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User)
WHERE mentionedUser.screen_name="johndoe"
RETURN meFollower, me, tweet, mentionedUser, meFollower.screen_name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (meFollower:Me)-[relation4:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me)-[relation5:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation6:MENTIONS]->(mentionedUser:User)
WHERE mentionedUser.screen_name="johndoe"
RETURN relation6, relation5, relation4, meFollower, me, tweet, mentionedUser, meFollower.screen_name
Rewrite: Provide the usernames of those following Me who have tweeted about the user 'johndoe'.

Question: Retrieve the profile image URLs of users who have retweeted tweets containing the link 'http://example.com'.
Cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)-[:CONTAINS]->(link:Link {url: "http://example.com"}), (retweet:Tweet)-[:RETWEETS]->(originalTweet), (user:User)-[:POSTS]->(retweet)
RETURN user, originalTweet, link, retweet, user.profile_image_url
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)-[relation4:CONTAINS]->(link:Link {url: "http://example.com"}), (retweet:Tweet)-[relation5:RETWEETS]->(originalTweet), (user:User)-[relation6:POSTS]->(retweet)
RETURN relation6, relation5, relation4, user, originalTweet, link, retweet, user.profile_image_url
Rewrite: Obtain the profile picture links of users who retweeted tweets that include the URL 'http://example.com'.

Question: Identify the locations of 'User' nodes who follow me and have posted tweets using the source 'Android'.
Cypher:
MATCH (follower:User)-[follows:FOLLOWS]->(me:Me),
      (follower)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[using:USING]->(source:Source)
WHERE source.name = "Android"
RETURN follower, follows, me, posts, tweet, using, source, follower.location
Rewrite: Determine the places of 'User' nodes that follow me and have tweeted from the 'Android' source.

Question: Can you show the URLs from 'Link' nodes contained in tweets that were posted by users located in 'New York'?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[contains:CONTAINS]->(link:Link)
WHERE user.location = 'New York'
RETURN user, posts, tweet, contains, link, link.url
Rewrite: Can you display the URLs in 'Link' nodes found in tweets posted by individuals situated in 'New York'?

Question: List out all the hashtags used in tweets that replied to tweets originally posted by a user with more than 5000 followers.
Cypher:
MATCH (originalUser:User)-[posts:POSTS]->(originalTweet:Tweet)<-[replyTo:REPLY_TO]-(replyTweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE originalUser.followers > 5000
RETURN originalUser, posts, originalTweet, replyTo, replyTweet, tags, hashtag, hashtag.name
Rewrite: Itemize all hashtags from responses to tweets issued by a user who has over 5000 followers.

Question: Which tweets mention me and are also tagged by the user 'alice'? Describe the connection between these tweets and the user.
Cypher:
MATCH (alice:User {screen_name: 'alice'})-[:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[:MENTIONS]->(me:Me), (tweet)-[:TAGS]->(tag:Hashtag)
RETURN alice, tweet, me, tag, tweet.text
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (alice:User {screen_name: 'alice'})-[relation4:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation5:MENTIONS]->(me:Me), (tweet)-[relation6:TAGS]->(tag:Hashtag)
RETURN relation6, relation5, relation4, alice, tweet, me, tag, tweet.text
Rewrite: Which tweets that include my mention are also tagged by the user 'alice'? Explain the relationship between these tweets and the user.

Question: Identify the tweets that were retweeted and later replied to, with details on the connections.
Cypher:
MATCH (originalTweet:Tweet)<-[retweetRelationship:RETWEETS]-(retweetedTweet:Tweet)-[replyRelationship:REPLY_TO]->(replyTweet:Tweet)
RETURN originalTweet, retweetRelationship, retweetedTweet, replyRelationship, replyTweet, originalTweet.text, retweetedTweet.text, replyTweet.text
Rewrite: Identify the tweets that were first retweeted and then received replies, detailing the interactions.

Question: Can you determine the tweets linking to 'http://news.com' that were mentioned in other tweets?
Cypher:
MATCH (linkingTweet:Tweet)-[containsLink:CONTAINS]->(link:Link), (tweet:Tweet)-[mentions:MENTIONS]->(linkingTweet)
WHERE link.url="http://news.com"
RETURN linkingTweet, containsLink, link, tweet, mentions, linkingTweet.text

Question: Trace the pathway for tweets that were posted by users who follow 'samsmith' and contain hashtags like #ai.
Cypher:
MATCH (userFollowing:User)-[follows:FOLLOWS]->(userFollowed:User {screen_name: 'samsmith'}), (userFollowing)-[posts:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[tags:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name='ai'
RETURN userFollowing, follows, userFollowed, posts, tweet, tags, hashtag, tweet.text
Rewrite: Track the route of tweets posted by users following 'samsmith' that include hashtags similar to #ai.

Question: Please find the tweets that were posted from iOS devices and later mentioned by tweets from users in 'California'.
Cypher:
MATCH (source:Source)<-[:USING]-(iosTweet:Tweet), (californiaUser:User)-[:POSTS]->(mentioningTweet:Tweet)-[:MENTIONS]->(iosTweet)
WHERE source.name CONTAINS 'iOS' AND californiaUser.location = 'California'
RETURN source, iosTweet, californiaUser, mentioningTweet, iosTweet.text
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (source:Source)<-[relation4:USING]-(iosTweet:Tweet), (californiaUser:User)-[relation5:POSTS]->(mentioningTweet:Tweet)-[relation6:MENTIONS]->(iosTweet)
WHERE source.name CONTAINS 'iOS' AND californiaUser.location = 'California'
RETURN relation6, relation5, relation4, source, iosTweet, californiaUser, mentioningTweet, iosTweet.text

Question: Provide the connections between tweets that contain the link 'https://tech.blog' and were retweeted by users with over 1000 followers.
Cypher:
MATCH (tweet:Tweet)-[containsLink:CONTAINS]->(link:Link), (user:User)-[posted:POSTS]->(tweet), (retweet:Tweet)-[retweets:RETWEETS]->(tweet)
WHERE link.url = 'https://tech.blog' AND user.followers > 1000
RETURN tweet, containsLink, link, user, posted, retweet, retweets, tweet.text
Rewrite: Identify the relationships among tweets featuring the URL 'https://tech.blog' that have been retweeted by users who possess more than 1000 followers.

Question: How many users have mentioned me in their tweets which include the hashtag #crypto?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[:MENTIONS]->(me:Me),
      (tweet)-[:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name="crypto"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT user)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation4:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)-[relation5:MENTIONS]->(me:Me),
      (tweet)-[relation6:TAGS]->(hashtag:Hashtag)
WHERE hashtag.name="crypto"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT user)
Rewrite: How many users have referenced me in tweets containing the hashtag #crypto?

Question: What is the average number of followers of users who retweeted tweets originally posted by 'janedoe'?
Rewrite: What is the typical follower count for users who have retweeted posts initially shared by 'janedoe'?

Question: Calculate the total number of favorites received by tweets that contain a link to 'https://example.com' posted by followers of 'charlie'.
Rewrite: Determine the sum of favorites for tweets linking to 'https://example.com' from users who follow 'charlie'.

Question: Count the number of different sources from which tweets that tagged me were posted.
Rewrite: Calculate how many unique platforms were used to post tweets that tagged me.

Question: What is the average number of tweets containing the #innovation hashtag mentioned by users located in 'Europe'?
Rewrite: What is the typical count of tweets that include the #innovation hashtag posted by users in 'Europe'?

Question: Can you determine the total number of statuses posted by users who follow both 'alice' and 'bob' and have mentioned them in tweets?
Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[:FOLLOWS]->(alice:Me {screen_name: 'alice'}), 
      (user)-[:FOLLOWS]->(bob:Me {screen_name: 'bob'}),
      (tweetAlice:Tweet)-[:MENTIONS]->(alice),
      (tweetBob:Tweet)-[:MENTIONS]->(bob),
      (user)-[:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)
WHERE tweetAlice = tweetBob
RETURN SUM(user.statuses)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[relation6:FOLLOWS]->(alice:Me {screen_name: 'alice'}), 
      (user)-[relation7:FOLLOWS]->(bob:Me {screen_name: 'bob'}),
      (tweetAlice:Tweet)-[relation8:MENTIONS]->(alice),
      (tweetBob:Tweet)-[relation9:MENTIONS]->(bob),
      (user)-[relation10:POSTS]->(tweet:Tweet)
WHERE tweetAlice = tweetBob
RETURN SUM(user.statuses)
Rewrite: Can you calculate the sum of statuses published by users who are followers of both 'alice' and 'bob' and have referenced them in tweets?
